elements.text:
You're on a date at a coffee shop with a person you really like. As you walk back to the table, you trip and fall and spill coffee everywhere.

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

text: I'm embarrassed that I tripped in front of my date, but this feeling will pass.
I'm confident that we'll have a great conversation.
I feel lucky I didn't hurt myself.
I'm upset that the date started off this way, but it might help us feel more comfortable talking to each other.
